title.rendered: African civic voice in the Post-2015 Development Agenda

content.rendered: Mithika Mwende of the Pan African Climate Justice Alliance shares insights on how African civil society organisations advocated for the inclusion of climate change justice in global development agendas.

excerpt.rendered: Mithika Mwende of the Pan African Climate Justice Alliance shares insights on how African civil society organisations advocated for the inclusion of climate change justice […]
